original_text: Lord, we agree that we are wicked people. Our ancestors also did bad things. We have turned against you. Lord, we agree that we are wicked people. Our ancestors also did bad things. We have turned against you. Lord, we agree that we are wicked people.
korean_text: 여호와여 우리의 악과 우리 조상의 죄악을 인정하나이다 우리가 주께 범죄하였나이다

sentences.original_text: Lord, we agree that we are wicked people.
sentences.korean_translation: 주님, 우리가 악한 사람들이라는 것을 인정합니다.

sentences.original_text: Our ancestors also did bad things.
Lord, we agree that we are wicked people.
sentences.korean_translation: 주님, 우리가 악한 사람들이라는 것을 인정합니다.
